name: Kosmo Endless Space Adventure
description:
A comet just hit your spaceship and an emergency landing was unavoidable!

Think you have what it takes to hop your way out of our creatively crafted levels? As you hop your way to the stars, you'll unlock tons of super-cute characters including CP-G, Space Marine and the ultimate Golden Kosmo. Dodge the poisonous bombs, beat your high scores and discover new worlds to make your way home!

Leap into action and start navigating through our newly updated endless-hopper that will certainly test your reflexes and your patience!

Features
-Lots of adorable characters
-Multiple challenging locations
-Simple touch controls easy to learn and use
-Smooth Interface and Impressive Graphics
-Earn endless rewards and level-up
-Record your best moments and share with friends
-Listen to your own music while playing
-Incredibly fun, addicting, where did the time go?!

Feel free to drop us a line! We’re always listening to your suggestions to improve Kosmo! If you have any issues with the app, just contact us and we will help!

Check out our other apps for more super addicting games!
